Start: ^A new day a new dawn my ass, we work in the void O’ryan I haven’t seen in weeks!! (It has been been a mere few days)
^FRED! There's my favorite little ball of light, how are you doing buddy!
^Hi Graciana! I have today off so I wanted to stop by and say hi!
^Well hello to you too Fred, would you like something to eat? I can check if we have any more lava lamps!
^Yes please! If you have the rainbow one I’ll have that one! I saw one in a catalog last night and it looked really fruity!
^If you can’t eat normal food do you know what fruit tastes like?
^Here ya go, we didn’t have rainbow but there was a blue and orange in the same lamp
^You haven’t had fizzy drinks either have you?
^no…… Frank keeps talking about how good your food is and I want to be a part of it.
^(Shit, hes is too innocent for this) Aw that sounds sweet, is Frank one of your crew?
^yeah! Hes the one that made the suit for me, well it was already made, but he made it a penguin for me because I wanted to fly!
^(Do I tell him Penguins can’t fly……. No, it would break his little heart)
^Well he sounds great! Do you spend a lot of time with Frank?
^yeah! He is kinda like my supervisor *Fred leans in* But between you and me, I think he just likes to look out for me so he does both his route and mine with me.
^He sounds like a great guy! Do you like going on your route with frank?
^Yeah, but lately he has been too busy to come along with me…… but I'm sure he will eventually come back and walk with me right?
^(Fuck, I am not built for this)
^Of course! He sounds like he cares about you a lot! I'm sure he will come back
^Well, even if he doesn’t you will still be able to make other friends on your route right?
^What if he never comes back, would you be ok?

c-0: ^I hope so, I like talking to people on my route, but sometime I don't know what to say and Frank helps me find the right words
^(Thank god this kid has a parent figure in his life)
^If Frank cares about so much to help you find friends and work even more just to spend time with you, I think there is nothing that can stop him from coming back
^Hey its what Friends are for right?
^Do friends also pay for meals when you don't have money
^(O'ryan please dont kill me) Its on the house bud, but next time maybe ask Frank for a little lamp money huh.
^Don't mention it Fred! ............ but like actually please don't mention it to anyone
c-1: ^I don't know, he really did a lot for me before, I don't think I can do much without him
^(Hot Dam this kid might be too attachted for his own good) (Maybe I can help make him a little more indpedent so he can make some new friends)
^When you came in to talk to me was Frank with you?
^We sure are! So if you came in here by yourself, and we are now friends.... do you see where I'm going?
^You helped me find the right things to say..... so your offering to help me meet new friends and talk to them right!!! (Fred looks at your with the biggest exicted puppy dog eyes you've ever seen)
^(shit........ not what I was getting at but how can I say no to those eyes....)
^exactly Fred, right again your on a roll today!

^Whoo! This is going to be so fun, you can come on my route with me, and I can show you all the fun I have with delivering packages and then we can get lavalamps and icecrream, and mabye even you can show me some of the cartoons Frank was talking about!
^(Graciana, you have dug you own grave, you must lie in it now)
^Well see heres the thing Fred, I can't quite leave just yet I work for a long long long long long time during the week, but maybe Sunday you could show me your route?
c-2: ^........................ he does a lot for me................... without him I don't know what I would do
^(Graciana you read the cover page of Success and how to do it, you got this)
^You came here and made a friend all by yourself, do you really need Frank?
^If he is busy you life can't just stop right? I'm sure you will be just fine without him
^Well its not Frank that has you delivering packages with him everyday right? Whether its right or wrong its Ums, which sidenote you know you can make friends without delivering them something right?
^But they said I need to pay off the suit and it would be a great way to meet people too.....
^Something about murdering two birds with one rock.....
^Oh honey two birds one stone is not real thats just a saying
^oh.... well thats good. I was worried about the birds
^(There are plenty of things for a kid to being with his life and working for UMS doesn't have to be one of them)
^Also child labor is illegal but that is a whole different conversation
^So Ums aren't't nice people? All of them and Frank helping me wasn't them being nice?
^Not necessarily everyoen you met aren't nice! Frank could be nice despite working there, but you should be careful with how easily you trust people.
^Just take some time to think about it, of whether or not you want to be delivering packages or maybe doing something else without the burden of working so you can wear a penguin suit.
^We can get you a differnet suit that doesn't require constant labor to wear!
^Okay .......... thanks Grciana I feel better now

Next: ^But I do want to circle back real quick Fred, did you say you were made from a star?
^I don't know what your confused about
^The only thing I remember about my birth was an explosion and bits of star dust slowly forming together over a few thousand years until I gained sentience
^Oh, I guess this is just the form that felt most natural to me after I got into the suit
^So you adapted to the suit? I thought it was the other way around?
^I don't really understand it, but I just found this to be more comfortable then what I was before
^I honestly don't remember, its been so long I forget most things about my old self
^Would you want to know more about your past?
^ Do you think you like life better now with Ums?

c-0: ^I obviously have no clue about your origin or much about stars in general
^I saw the application to this job on a flyer in a dream so I don't really understand much about the outer worlds or those who live in it in general
^But! You could ask O'Ryan about it if you would like to maybe learn a little more about yourself!
^I don't know do you think I should? I remember bits and pieces of my previous form, but I'm pretty happy with the past few hundred years in this form.
^Yeah! I lost count after 300 because work was distracting
c-1: ^Do you think life is better now working for Ums?
^Well its been fun making friends on my deliveries for a while, but its gotten better now that I've met more people like you and Frank!
^Aww that nice Fred, when did you and Fred first meet?
^Well he had been working at Ums before I got there, but he was in a different department then I was so I never saw him
^I think he got moved to my route 300ish years ago, I lost count

Final: ^.................. Fred have you been paying off that suit for hundreds of years
^(Mutters to self Shithead coperation has been taking advantage of this poor kid for that long without him saying a dam thing)
^(I better make sure this Frank guy hasn't been using him too)
^So Fred during all that time when did you and Frank become close?
^Well he started giving me advice on how to make friends and talk to people at first
^But then after a while he started just talking to me while we were going to  deliveries about his day and the people he met the night before
^The night before? Fred when do you work?
^So he works a night shift and then works a morning to afternoon shift with you?
^(What the hell is he, there no time to sleep or eat during all that time)
^And fred do you know what Frank is?
^No like you are a star child or space born or... you get my point, what is Frank?
^Oh, I think he is human, or at least he looks human.
^Oh but he does have a Black cat named May too!
^(Guy who never sleeps, looks human, and has a Black cat.... this guys either a wizard or some Eldritch Creature..... but it doesn't sound like hes all bad news with how much Fred adores him)
^Well Frank's awesomness aside I think you should talk to your boss about your work, there is no way a suit can be worth 300 plus years of work
^Fred how much was the suit? Do you remember what they said?
^Well heres what Im going to ask you to do Fred, when you go back to work from your break go see Frank, and ask him the number and have him write it down for me
^Because unless you stumbled into one of the universes most expsenive prototype space suits I doubt it costs 300 years of work. Something about that seems wrong
^And if you really trust Frank and he cares for you see if he can help you cut a better deal with UMS, because it seems like you like your delivery route right?
^Yeah! I've met a lot of nice people!
^Thats great Fred! So how about this, sometime this week when you have another break come stop by and see me and you can tell me all about what happened over an orange swirl.
^Come back after takling with Frank and Ums and you just might find out
^(Its just an orange lavalamp from home I'll put in the blender with some cream to make orange sherbet flavor)
^I will! Bye Graciana!!!! See you soon!
monday: ^I didn't think Mondays were busy, though...
^Well, time to unlock tha portal, ya?
tuesday: ^Ya ever wake up and think, "ah man, I coulda been famous!"
^Well, I don't! I love it here! Ahahaha!
^Another Tuesday in tha kitchen, surrounded by food!
^...I wish I had your optimism, Chef...
^Ay, time to unlock the portal. Ya ready, Graciana?
wednesday: ^Somethin' feels off. Like, tha energy of tha food is screamin' at me...
^There's somethin' I tell ya... Somethin' goin' on...
^Go an' open up tha portal, ya?
thursday: ^Ay, had a long night of cookin'...
^Nothin' in particular, was just experimentin' with some stuff.
^...You stayed up all night for that? On a Thursday?
^Ya. Why wouldn't I? I had a lot of ideas!
friday: ^We got a big day ahead of us!
^Fridays get busy, an' CeCe ain't here.
^Good! 'Cause I'ma be stuck in the kitchen all day!
^Aight! let's crack open the portal and get rockin'!
saturday: ^Saturdays are busy too, huh? That makes sense.
^Ay, very! Another day in the kitchen for me!
^Ay, unlock the portal and let's get crackin'!
